\subsection*{\phantomsection%
  Importance of transparency%
  \addcontentsline{toc}{subsection}{Importance of transparency}%
  \label{importance-of-transparency}%
}
%
\begin{itemize}

\item the more we are, the more cracks could be fixed

\item something transparent is potentially more trustworthy

\end{itemize}


%___________________________________________________________________________

\subsection*{\phantomsection%
  Benefits of Open Data%
  \addcontentsline{toc}{subsection}{Benefits of Open Data}%
  \label{benefits-of-open-data}%
}
%
\begin{itemize}

\item greater interoperability

\item better control on data, can be controled by more people

\end{itemize}


%___________________________________________________________________________

\subsubsection*{\phantomsection%
  Example from SNCF%
  \addcontentsline{toc}{subsubsection}{Example from SNCF}%
  \label{example-from-sncf}%
}

The SNCF has recently started an open sourcing process to provide consumers raw data.
This allows newcomers to build interesting piece of software wxith minimal effort

\item as described by Rick Falvinge, the most important freedom is probably the information freedom

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\item The website nosdeputes.fr is a citizen's proposition to get a log of our deputes's acts

\end{itemize}
